bill.title: James M. Inhofe National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2023 Commission on Reform and Modernization of the Department of State Act Diplomatic Support and Security Act of 2022 Secure Embassy Construction and Counterterrorism Act of 2022 FedRAMP Authorization Act Performance Enhancement Reform Act United States-Taiwan Public Health Protection Act Daniel Anderl Judicial Security and Privacy Act of 2022 Otto Warmbier Countering North Korean Censorship and Surveillance Act of 2022 Global Health Security and International Pandemic Prevention, Preparedness and Response Act of 2022 FENTANYL Results Act Fighting Emerging Narcotics Through Additional Nations to Yield Lasting Results Act United States-Ecuador Partnership Act of 2022 Taiwan Enhanced Resilience Act PLUM Act of 2022 Periodically Listing Updates to Management Act of 2022 Water Resources Development Act of 2022 Financial Data Transparency Act of 2022 21st Century Assistive Technology Act Don Young Coast Guard Authorization Act of 2022 Department of State Authorization Act of 2022 Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2023
bill.description: Providing for the concurrence by the House in the Senate amendment to H.R. 7776, with an amendment.

history.action: Mr. Smith (WA) moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules. (consideration: CR H8840-8853)
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 1512.
DEBATE - The House resumed with debate on H. Res. 1512.
On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 350 - 80 (Roll no. 516).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

votes.desc: Final Passage Under Suspension of the Rules Results
